description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Ready to kill some Stick Figures? You'll get your chance in this hilarious and challenging 2D side-scrolling shooter.  14 Levels, 7 Bosses, 8 Vehicle Types including (Tank, Jet, Helicopter, Jeep, Hovercraft, LZR-80, Bomber, and Speed Boat).  Play Campaign or Survival Modes, alone or with a friend on Xbox Live or System Link.
